item.title: How Pro-Lifers Can Overcome Their Messaging Challenge
item.description: The superficial perception of abortion as compassionate for people in difficult situations is precisely what the pro-life community must pierce.

item.title: It Isn’t A ‘Crisis’ For Trump To Fire Flag Officers, It’s A Crisis To Think He Can’t
item.description: Trump's decision to fire flag officers isn’t a break with American law and tradition. The warning about a crisis is the crisis.
